verses.name: Job 5:1
verses.text: Call now, if there be any that will answer thee; and to which of the saints wilt thou turn?

verses.name: Job 5:2
verses.text: For wrath killeth the foolish man, and envy slayeth the silly one.

verses.name: Job 5:3
verses.text: I have seen the foolish taking root: but suddenly I cursed his habitation.

verses.name: Job 5:4
verses.text: His children are far from safety, and they are crushed in the gate, neither is there any to deliver them.

verses.name: Job 5:5
verses.text: Whose harvest the hungry eateth up, and taketh it even out of the thorns, and the robber swalloweth up their substance.
